testsuite.name: ingest_sources.Ingesting sources (paths and uniform resource locators)

testcase.classname: ingest_sources.Ingesting sources (paths and uniform resource locators)
testcase.name: Ingest a file via file:// uniform resource locator
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Ingest a file via file:// uniform resource locator Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.003s And a text file "hello.txt" exists with contents "hello" ... passed in 0.000s When I ingest the file uniform resource locator for "hello.txt" into corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.004s Then the last ingest succeeds ... passed in 0.000s And the last ingested item has biblicus provenance with a file source uniform resource identifier ... passed in 0.003s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: ingest_sources.Ingesting sources (paths and uniform resource locators)
testcase.name: Ingest a markdown file via file:// uniform resource locator

testcase.classname: ingest_sources.Ingesting sources (paths and uniform resource locators)
testcase.name: Ingest a file via http:// uniform resource locator

testcase.classname: ingest_sources.Ingesting sources (paths and uniform resource locators)
testcase.name: Ingest a binary file via http:// uniform resource locator
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Ingest a binary file via http:// uniform resource locator Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.004s And a binary file "blob.bin" exists ... passed in 0.000s And a hypertext transfer protocol server is serving the workdir ... passed in 0.002s When I ingest the hypertext transfer protocol uniform resource locator for "blob.bin" into corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.008s Then the last ingest succeeds ... passed in 0.000s And the last ingested item has a sidecar metadata file ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: ingest_sources.Ingesting sources (paths and uniform resource locators)
testcase.name: Ingest a Portable Document Format file via http:// uniform resource locator
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Ingest a Portable Document Format file via http:// uniform resource locator Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.004s And a binary file "report.pdf" exists ... passed in 0.000s And a hypertext transfer protocol server is serving the workdir ... passed in 0.003s When I ingest the hypertext transfer protocol uniform resource locator for "report.pdf" into corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.005s Then the last ingest succeeds ... passed in 0.000s And the last ingested item's sidecar includes media type "application/pdf" ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
